i206b1('bum): dgu myi gas so// gsal pa bcom ldan 'odas rnams mar dag pas rnam pang 'a pa sa sto ma nA tshan ma med pa'i ma sman pa myang m+b+ha tshul dz+nyA / bcom na 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
i206b2('bum): pasha ra dwa ta'i bu shin du rnam par dgi pa'i phyir ro/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'asas bka' su la dzA l-I ri no rnam par dag pa sde rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / smin pa myong ba ma 'tshalang

i208a7('bum): phyir ro/ gselang pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen doka 'ad la sman par myi bgying gnong pa mu 'gyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa

i208b1('bum): kyi phyi phreng du bya na pa rnam par dag pas na che se gsasapa yongs su le nang pa ma mchis sa/ ma snyed 'dus kyis rgya gas su langs/ sharadz+dzaH rna pa'i phyir ro// gri so lang

i209b2('bum): lder blangs kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor nga shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdza ba myang pa ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'angs bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du sna rnam par dag pa'i slad du
i209b3('bum): sna rnam par dag pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsilang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas/ sna rnam par dag pa
i209b4('bum): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag myed pa'i phyir sna myed pa ni rnam par dag pa'o// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag par/

i230b7('bum): mtha' las 'das bstong pa nyid nga thog sa dang bamyong ba slong ba nyid kyi phyir ro// gsolang / bcom ldan das bdag kun du mdza mas pa'i slang du mtha' pas 'das spong ba nyid kun du mtha' yas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis pa

i235a1('bum): spong pa nyid nga thob ma pa ga myong ba slong ba nyid kyi phyir ro// rim po bco brgyad pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltarang rdzogs pa ni byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa
i235a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyinang pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa / rab 'byor nga shi nang du/ rje par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rang
i235a3('bum): kyi 'os du phyin pa rnam par dag palag pamanan sa kyis gang sum / las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi / nams yos ldan 'a mag rgya chu mas dpa sems pa'i chen thogs ra kyi 'om tsun pa la slo
i235a4('bum): che/ chu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha re lang gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na myi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rje par dag kyi
i235a5('bum): phyir ro/ gselang pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i srang du dung chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen pa shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ nu rolang gyi 'bras 'am/ pha rol gyi bras 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na myi gnas shing / shin turna pams
i235a6('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' mam theg pa pa ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de thabs myi mkhas pa
i235a7('bum): kyi ma sbyin pa 'di la byigs pa rdul du shes cing 'i/ ga' kyi ma tsun pa san du phyi la/ shesas kyi ma tsun da pa ring du song 'o// mam ldan das kyis pa 'phrul pa/ ra
i235a8('bum): 'dri ba te/ rang byo segs so// lags so/ mam phyi de ni mying drugs pa yi/ nanams ngan pa pa mi no/ nasos sa ldan ma'i song kyi dum chegs ni ma ra me ma mas bsags com ldan pa
i235b1('bum): kyis bka' stsalang ba/ rab 'byerang 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha relang du phyin pa la mying du 'dzin ngam mtshan mar 'dzin na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha relang du phyin pa la mying dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing
i235b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha relang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gseg du 'byinang to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ring du spong ba'o// rab 'byor nga gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
i235b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la mtshan mar gzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pas rlom sems su myi byed na/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha
i235b4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byi nad to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byord kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
i235b5('bum): kyi pha relang du phyinang pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan pa la/ chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar me'o/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab byer nga la 'di skad ces smras so
i235b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs kyi chags pa ni gang yin ma chags pa gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs
i235b7('bum): myi mkhas pas/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba steng ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes

i240a5('bum): so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongasu sde bar myi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongasu sde bar myi nus so// myig ga rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i rang bzhin yongasu

i240a8('bum): su sngo bar sgo nus so// myig gi rnam shes pa rang bzhin yongs su su bar gyi nus so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar gyi num po// pA rnam par shes pa rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i rnam pa
i240b1('bum): ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs
i240b2('bum): su bsngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi
i240b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i
i240b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cher ba'i rang bzhin yongs su
i240b5('bum): byar myi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs
i240b6('bum): sngo bar myi nus so// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rlung gyi khams kyi rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin
i240b7('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su myi nus so/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
i240b8('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// skye mched drug kyi rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// reg pa rgyu/ 'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshor ba'i rang
i241a1('bum): yongs su sngo bar mi nus so// srang ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// le nang pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sring ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su
i241a2('bum): sde bar myi nus so// rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshul khrims pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// bzod ba'i
i241a3('bum): pha rolang du phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// shes
i241a4('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sde par myi nus so// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo pa/ 
i241a5('bum): myi nus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chen po stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus pong / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 
i241a6('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su myi nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
i241a7('bum): rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su myi nus so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang bzhin chos thams stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs
i241a8('bum): su sde bar myi nus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myi dmyigs pa spong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dngos po myed pa spong ba ste nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su
i241b1('bum): bar myi nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar
i241b2('bum): myi nus so/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so

i241b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams rang bzhin yongs su sde bar mya nus so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar mi nus so// mthar kyis gnas par snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ 
i241b6('bum): rnam par ba ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang ston pa myed pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngobar myi nus so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi rang
i241b7('bum): bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su
i241b8('bum): sngo bar myi nus se/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// byams pa che po'i rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// snying rje rje chen po ring bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sangs rgyas
i242a1('bum): kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sde bar
i242a2('bum): mi nus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi
i242a3('bum): rabazhin yongs su sde bar myi nus so// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar myi nus so// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i242a4('bum): byang chub su yang dag par bdon dengam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba sbeng ma/ yang dag par dag byas na/ yang dag par rjes su song ba med kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par byo'o// yang dag par bskul pa
i242a5('bum): phyi/ yang dag par spro bskyed bu'o// yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya'o// de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de zhes bya rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang
i242a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzeng pa'i pha rol du phyin/ 
i242a7('bum): bal srung de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / badren 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa la spong po nga/ bdagani bsam gtan gyi pha mang tu phyin pa la spyod por rtse// zhes bya bar rnam por rtog par myi 'gyur ro// pa rang shes
i242a8('bum): pa'is de du na pa la spyad pa'i chi/ bdag ni gis rab kyi pa'i lang du phyind pa la spyod de zhes bya ba rnam pa jog par gyi 'thun pa dang / nang spong ba nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag na nang sring banyings spong nga 'as bya bar rnam par dog pa
i242b1('bum): myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar ma rnam par rtog par

i242b4('bum): pa nyid la spyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
i242b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam pa
i242b6('bum): rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid la spyod de'i tshe/ bdag ni dor ba stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin spong ba nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong ba nyid la

i242b8('bum): pa rang ba mtshan nyid byung bzhing sa srung gis bya bar rnam par rtog pa mi gyur ba dang / kyi phyogs pa stong ba nyid la spong ba / danan gyi myigs pa thong ba nyid sa spong zhes bya bar gyi rnam par rtog par su/ 
i243a1('bum): pa dang / dngas po srung ba stong pa nyid la spyod pa'irje/ bdag na dngos po myeng ba stong pa nyid la spyod de nas bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / jo ba nyid stong pa nyid la spyong ba'i ma/ bdag ni ngo ba nyid mang ba nyid
i243a2('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar
i243a3('bum): gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'ing/ bdag ni dran pa la bar gzhag pa rnams la sted do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnas la spyod ba'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyong de zhes bya bar ma
i243a4('bum): par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rjes la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rjes la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rjes la spyod do zhes/ 
i243a5('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnas la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni spobs rnas la spyod de zhes bya bar rnam sa par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan
i243a6('bum): los rnams la srung ngo'i tshe// zhes bya bar rnam par myi 'gyur dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam lan lag brgya pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rna bar rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang
i243a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes la spyod pa'i che/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnas la spyod pa'i tshe/ bodag ni bsam tan rnams la spyod de zhes bya bar rnam
i243a8('bum): par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag na chang myeng pa rnams la spyod ngo nas bya bar rno par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas la spyod pa'i tshe bdag ni gzugs
i243b1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbed do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par tha ra pa rgyang la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mthar
i243b2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu la sbeng ba'i tshe/ bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
i243b3('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sdesgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ro/ ba dang mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i cha
i243b4('bum): bdag mngon par shes pa rnaMs la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzinang rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dgazugs kyi sde
i243b5('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sde rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams sa spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs rnams
i243b6('bum): la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sa sa yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang spyod do zhes bya bar 'gra rnam par myi 'gyur ba'i dang / byams pa chen po
i243b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byams pa chen po la skyed do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par myi rtag par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
i243b8('bum): ma 'dres pa bce brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba co brgyad la spyod de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni d+hu nang du zhugs pa'i 'ja
i243b9('bum): la spyod zhes bya bar rno bar rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa rnaMs la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams
i244a1('bum): bu la sbed pa'i tshe/ de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbed de zhes bya bar rnam par reg kar mi
i244a2('bum): 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod de zhes bya bar
i244a3('bum): par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i che/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / la gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la spyod do nas
i244a4('bum): bya bar rnam par rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / de ltar yang dag par sman par bya/ 
i244a5('bum): yang dag par bskul bar bya/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya sa la/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na myong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par skul bar bya'o/ 
i244a6('bum): yang dag par sde bskyed par bya'o/ yang dag par dga' ba bsgreng bar bya'o// da yang dag par bstanang ba de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par bsgo ba skyed bang bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' bskyed par bya ba des/ bam
i244a7('bum): yang dag par bstan cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par na ba byed pa'i cha/ rmi drung bar myi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na/ rigs kyi
i244a8('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu me des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// bam po bcu dru pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'byo rang la logs pa
i244b1('bum): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byorang khyed de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa'i rnam par de lta bu dag stond pa legs so lags so// rab 'byorang de bas na khyed la chags pa
i244b2('bum): dang / chags pa'i rnam par de bas kyang 'dra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag shin du legs par nyon la ying la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan
i244b3('bum): 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor rang 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin ga shegs
i244b4('bum): pa dgra bcom ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed ma/ rab 'byor cum du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das pa dang / ma 'byonang ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
i244b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'bra sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing yid
i244b6('bum): las byas nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems
i244b7('bum): can gzhan rnas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ni rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed de deb ma du rags pa'o// de ci'i phyir
i244b8('bum): zhes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la byed pa ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni zab pa
i245a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro// gsel ba'/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab 'akyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
i245a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga pa ni ma byas mngon par ma byas paste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'arang rgyu bar myi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
i245a3('bum): mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni cig du zad de/ rab 'byor kyi rang bzhin cig po gang yin pa de ni rang
i245a4('bum): bzhin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa'o// rang bzhin ma yin
i245a5('bum): pa ma byas pa mngon par 'dum byas pa shes na chags pa'i rna ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// gselang ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa rtogs par dka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
i245a6('bum): stsalang pa/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni sus kyang mthong ma thos ma rtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
i245a7('bum): tu phyi nang pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang de ni 'di ltar sems kyis so/ 'am shes pa'o// gzugs kyis ma shes pa'o// tshor bas ma shes so// 'du shes kyi ma shes
i245a8('bum): so 'du byed kyis ma shes so/ rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mig gis ma shes so/ rna bas ma shes so// sngas ma shes so// lces ma shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis
i245b1('bum): ma shes so// sgras ma shes sa/ dris ma shes so// ros ma shes so/ reg gis ma shes so// chos kyis ma shes so// myig gi rnam par shis bla ma shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// sna'i rnam par
i245b2('bum): shes pas ma shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lus kyi rnam par shes ma shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// myig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes
i245b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// rna ba'i
i245b4('bum): dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis nor ma mi gas po// pA'i 'dus cheg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas mashes so/ rje'i 'du rig pa'i rgyanang kyis tshor bas mgos so// lus kyi 'dus rig pa'i rgyun gyis tshor bas na sa
i245b5('bum): yang kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ sa'i khams kyis ma shes so// chu'i 'ams kyis mnas po/ me'i 'khams kyis ma shes so// rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so// na ma'a'i khams kyis mashes
i245b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so// ma rig pas ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mying dang gzugs kyis ma shes so// skye 'ched drug gis ma shes sa sa
i245b7('bum): rigasas ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// sred papa la shes so// len pas su shes so// glid pas nas pa/ thugs mags so/ dashes mashes so// sbyin pa'i ro la na pas ma gas pa
i245b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so/ shes rab kyi pha rol
i246a1('bum): phyi nang pas ma shes so/ nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes pa/ chen po stong pa nyid kyisnga ma
i246a2('bum): shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'du byas spong ba nyid kyis shes so// 'dum byas spong ba nyid kyis ma shes so// mtha' las 'das pa song ba nyid kyis ma shes so// thog ma dang tha ma myong ba spong ba nyid
i246a3('bum): kyis ma shes so/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma sheso// rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyis ma shes so// myi dmyigs pa spongs
i246a4('bum): nyid kyisam shes so// dngos po myang ba stong pa nyid kyis shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis shes so// dngos po mye ba'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyis ma shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so// yang ba
i246a5('bum): par spong ba rnas kyis ma shes so// rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa rnas kyis ma shes so// dbang po rjes kyis ma shes so// stobs rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rdzas kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa thil
i246a6('bum): las brgyang pas mya shes so// 'phags de'i bden rnams kyis sems / thasam gtan mas kyis mags so/ ra rnams kyis das so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par la gyu ba rnams kyis shesu sa ma
i246a7('bum): ma ma kyis bdas pa'i rnas par la rgya ba bus ma shes s+ho// rnam du 'a ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / na nyi nga smo pa rnyed pas ma shes so// mngon pa gas pa rnams kyis po shes so// de la na rnams kyis shes so// 
i246a8('bum): sde rdzas kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams kyis mashes so// myi 'jigs pa rnas kyi dang ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnas kyis ma shes so// byams pa chen ris ma shes so// snying rje chen sa shes
i246b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis ma shes so/ rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir myi 'ang ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes
i246b2('bum): rang byang chub kyis ma shes so// lam gyi rje bar shes pa nyid kyis mi shes shes so// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyang
i246b3('bum): pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ni bgyi ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom gyi rtsa ldan 'a
i246b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor byed pa'i myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du gzugs myi dmyigs pa dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / myig
i246b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa dang / rdza ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sna myi dmyigs pa dang / lce myi dmyigs pa dang / lus myi dmyigs pa dang / yid myi dmyigs pa dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa dang / dri myi dmyigs pa dang / 
i246b6('bum): ro myi dmyigs pa dang / reg myi dmyigs pa dang / chos myi dmyigs pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / sna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lce'i rna bar
i246b7('bum): shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lus kyi rna bar shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yid kyi rdza bar shes pa'i myi dmyigs pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mya dmyigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mya dmyigs pa dang / sna'i 'dum
i246b8('bum): rig rgyam gyi tshugs pa dang / lce'i 'dus 'i rig sa kyi tshugs pa dang / lus kyi 'a'i rig pa myi dmyigs pa dang yid kyi 'dus te ga pa myi dmyigs pa dang / phyag gi 'dus te rig pa las zung ba'i tshe
i247a1('bum): ba myi myigs pa dang / rnam pa sha ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs
i247a2('bum): ba dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i myi dmyigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor myi dmyigs pa dang / sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa dang / me'i khams myi dmigs pa dang / 
i247a3('bum): rlung gyi khams myi dmyigs pa dang / nam mi khams myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa dang / rna bar shes pa myi dmyigs po dang / myi
i247a4('bum): dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa dang / reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa dang / len pa myi dmyigs pa dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa dang / skye ba'i mya dmyig
i247a5('bum): ba dang / rbA shi myi dmyigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ra lang du phyind pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol dang phyinang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i247a6('bum): phyinang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bsam gtan pha rol du phyinang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / phyi nang sa
i247a7('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas so
i247a8('bum): ma nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa spong ba gyid myi dbyigs pa dang / thog ma dang mi myed pa spong ba'i nyid mi dmyigs pa dang / dor ba skyed pa spong ba nyid mu rmugs pa dag rang badzin spong ba nyid myi dmyig pa dang chomam
i247b1('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid steng myi dmyigs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po me
i247b2('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dran pa nye gzhag pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / dab po myi dmyigs pa dang / stobs myi dmyigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
i247b3('bum): lal myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bas gtan myi myigs pa dang / tshade myi dmyigs pa dang / gzug myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 
i247b4('bum): rna bar tha ra pa rgyad myi dmyigs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs pa dang / rna bar tharang pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa myi dmyigs
i247b5('bum): pa dang ting nge 'dzind myi dmyigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo myi dmyigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmyigs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa myi dmyigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa myi dmyigs pa dang / byas de chen po myi dmyi
i247b6('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches 'dres pa bco brgya myi dmyigs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa dang / lan cig phyir ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'dra bu myi dmyigs pa dang / dgra bcom
i247b7('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang bya rlu myi dmyigs pa dang / la gyi rna bar shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rdzab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs phu nga'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems
i247b8('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa'i lang du phyin pa la spyod pas rje ba'i 'ur spyod pa bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byengad chub se sa dpa' ses dpa' rje logs rab kye de la phyin pa ma myong po me
i248a1('bum): la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod // gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba
i248a2('bum): 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs
i248a3('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa
i248a4('bum): 'am mya sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do// gal te tshor ba la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang la spyod do// gal tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i248a5('bum): phyinang pa la spyong ngo // gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro long du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi srung na/ 
i248a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mya sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am
i248a7('bum): myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag myong ba'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba deng lta bu'i tshor ba myed nga// gal te 'du shes la myi spyod na/ shes
i248a8('bum): rab kyi pha yang du phyin pa la spyad do// gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mye rtag ces bya ba mo spong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am
i248b1('bum): sdug sngal ces bya bar myi spyod nang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
i248b2('bum): gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdig ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
i248b3('bum): bdag gam/ bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du shes myed do// gal te 'du byed la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed rtag
i248b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na/ gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
i248b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am/ 
i248b6('bum): sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
i248b7('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed myed do// gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
i248b8('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// 
i249a1('bum): gal rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag mya nganas bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spya dang // galang rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mya sdug ces bya bar ma spyad na shas
i249a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes
i249a3('bum): pa myed do// gal te myig la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa spyod do// gal te myig rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te myig bde zhes bya'i sdug
i249a4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar myi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed do// gal te myig bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig sdug ces bya ba 'am/ 
i249a5('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug pa 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba/ 
i249a6('bum): de lta bu'i myig myed do// gal te rna ba la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad de// gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa spyod do// gal te rna ba
i249a7('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ra lang tu phyi rang pa la spyod do// gal ti rdza ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
i249a8('bum): rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang rtag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bang po 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
i249b1('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba myed do// gal te sA la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i249b2('bum): yang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snga bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
i249b3('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te snga sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba'i bdag
i249b4('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna myed do// g.yod lce la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i249b5('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi
i249b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do// gal te lce sdug ces bya ba dang myi sdug ces par myi spyod na sheso rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba'o// dngan/ 
i249b7('bum): gam bdas myed pa 'am sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'thur ba de lta dri gyi myed do// ga se mas pa gyi srung shes rabakyi pa ral tu byer pa la spong ngo // ga de lus cag ces bya ba 'ang gyi da ces bya ba ma spyod na nam pa/ 
i249b8('bum): kyob rabang tu phyin pa la spang de// ga te lus pade zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyang sa nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal ta lus bdab pas bya ba 'am bdag par ces bya bar myi spyong nas pa/ 
i250a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am dad pa 'am
i250a2('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus myed do// gal te yid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyod do// gal te yid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
i250a3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la smod de// gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
i250a4('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// gel te yid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag
i250a5('bum): pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid myed do// gal te gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
i250a6('bum): gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i250a7('bum): la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
i250a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do// 
i250b1('bum): gal te smra la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbya zhes/ 
i250b2('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod
i250b3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra myed// gal
i250b4('bum): dri la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi
i250b5('bum): skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal to bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myod ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod de// dol te dri sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod dunas/ 
i250b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir nan/ gang rtag pa'am myi rtag pa'i bde ba'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myeng ba'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri myang // gal ter
i250b7('bum): la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi
i250b8('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang do// gal te ri bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ril tu
i251a1('bum): napa ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spong // ga tug ces byaba'am m-i rtag ces bya bar gyi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyidan pa la spyong // de la reg pa zhes bya ba'am sdug sAl zhes pa bar gyi sung dums
i251a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba la spyod do/ g.yete rag bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang do// gal te reg sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug cis bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha nga
i251a3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg myed do// gal te chos la myi spyod na shes
i251a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te chos rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te chos bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa red
i251a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spang ngo // gapa'i chos bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te chos sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
i251a6('bum): pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag med pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos myed do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa
i251a7('bum): la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rna par shes pa dang
i251b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal nas bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la sbed da// gal ta myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa
i251b2('bum): spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba'i bdag
i251b3('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta'i myig gi rnam par shes pa myeng ngo // gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes
i251b4('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
i251b5('bum): gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug pa 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i251b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa'i sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam por nas pa myed de/ 
i251b7('bum): gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// 
i251b8('bum): gal ta sA'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyad de// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes ra
i252a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi
i252a2('bum): rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i252a3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyad do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te lha'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal
i252a4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rna bar
i252a5('bum): shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa
i252a6('bum): 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i'o rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus rnam par shes pa rtag
i252a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
i252a8('bum): spyong do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myang ces bya bar mi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces
i252b1('bum): bya bar myi srid na shas rab kyi pha rayang du phyin pa la srung nga// dbyer phyir na/ gang rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad pa'am bde ba'am sdug sngal ba'am bdag gas bdas myang ba'am sdug par/ 
i252b2('bum): myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba la
i252b3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid
i252b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
i252b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rna bar shes/ 
i252b6('bum): pa myed do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
i252b7('bum): gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
i252b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'i myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'o/ 
i253a1('bum): sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
i253a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te na ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab
i253a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i bde ba
i253a4('bum): 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
i253a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'i sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang / 
i253a6('bum): da gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spad // gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i253a7('bum): tu phyin pa la skyed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'i sdug sbal ba la bdag gam bdag myeng pa'i sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// gal te lce'i 'dus
i253a8('bum): te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ngo // gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mu rtag ces bya bar mi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde
i253b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de// gal ta lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad du// 
i253b2('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug pa 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam
i253b3('bum): bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar
i253b4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te
i253b5('bum): reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i253b6('bum): du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de ltar bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
i253b7('bum): myeng ngo // gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i253b8('bum): phyi pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te rag pa pang zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyad na gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong do// gas to yid kyi 'dus te rig po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
i254a1('bum): myod ces bya ba myi spyad dgas rang gra pa yang tu byan pa la srung de// gas te yid kyi 'dus tadag pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad du shes ra kyi pa rabal tu band pa 'a spyang / 
i254a2('bum): daci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de sa bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med de// gal te myig ga 'dus
i254a3('bum): tedag pa las byung ba'i tshing ba la m-i spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pal spyod de// gal mug gi 'dus te rig pa las drung ba'i nga ba dag ces bya ba'am mi dag ces bya bar myi srud nags ra kyi
i254a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// gal te myigo gi 'dus te reg pa
i254a5('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi
i254a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu
i254a7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
i254a8('bum): ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal de rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar mi spongs
i254b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba la spyang ngo // gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te rna ba'i 'dus te
i254b2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag ga
i254b3('bum): bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i254b4('bum): spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes
i254b5('bum): bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang // gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi tharas
i254b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi ngan/ 
i254b7('bum): pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'i myi sdug par 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la
i254b8('bum): myo spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod ngo do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i
i255a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la sbed de// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya bal
i255a2('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i255a3('bum): spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lha'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// 
i255a4('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na
i255a5('bum): rab kyi pha ming du phyirid pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i ra ba bang zhes bya ba 'am sdug sprul zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyirang pa la spyad nga// gal te lus kyi 'dus kyi
i255a6('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dag ces bya ba'am bdag myeng ces bya bar myi spyang na shes rab kyi par mang tu phyin pa la spyong nga// galata lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung gA tshar bsdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug pas bya
i255a7('bum): myi su na shes rab kyi pa sang tu phyin pa la sadang // datso'i phyir zher/ gang dag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bad pa'am sdug sbal pa ma bdag gas bdag myed pa 'ang sdug shwi ma myi sdug par 'gyung bar ma drar lus kyi du/ 
i255a8('bum): rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i chung ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa ra lang du phyid pa sa sreng nga// gal te yad kyi 'dus te reg pa las chung ba tshod dgacas bya ba
i255b1('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar mi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spang // gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dade zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
i255b2('bum): gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba
i255b3('bum): 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
i255b4('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te sa'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba
i255b5('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ngo // gal te sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ 
i255b6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir na/ gang
i255b7('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sa'i khams myed do// gal te nu'i khams pa myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i255b8('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i256a1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar
i256a2('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chul
i256a3('bum): khams myed do// gal te me'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te me'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal
i256a4('bum): me'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te me'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spro nga na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i256a5('bum): la spyod do// gal te me'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am
i256a6('bum): bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i me'i khams myed do// gal te rlung gi khams la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
i256a7('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams
i256a8('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
i256b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am skye sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung gi khams myed do// gal te nam mkha'i khams la myi spyod na
i256b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal
i256b3('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams sdug
i256b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am
i256b5('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nam mkha'i khams myed do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod// galatan par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba'i myi rtag ces bya bar myi/ 
i256b6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te rnam par shes pa'i khas bde zhes bya ba'i sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khas bdag ces bya ba'i bdag myed
i256b7('bum): ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyad do// u par rnas pa'i khas sdug ces bya ba rgya sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa spyod do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa myi rtag pa'i dad babasdun
i256b8('bum): sngal ba'i bdag gi bdag myed pa'i sdug pa'i myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// / bam po nyi shu pa'o// / gal ta ma rig pa la myi spyod na shes
i257a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa dang zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya
i257a2('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa mangs phyin pa' snang // gas ta ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba rnam bdag med ces bya ba myi smod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la srid de// gagati ma rig pa sdug ces bya ba 'am
i257a3('bum): sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sprul ba 'am bdag gam bdag myang ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
i257a4('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa myed do// gal te 'du byed la myi spangan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ngo // gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
i257a5('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi da spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
i257a6('bum): tu phyin de pa la spyong // gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa bam myi rtag pa 'am bde 'am sdug bsngal pa
i257a7('bum): 'am bdag gami bdag myed pa'am sdu gi bsngal pa 'am ma sdug par 'gyur ba'i da lta bu'i 'du byed myed do// gsung+ge rnam pathonas pa la myi spyad na shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad da// gal te rnam
i257a8('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi rid pa la spong ngo // gal ta rnam par shes bu bang zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyad na shas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
i257b1('bum): la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i257b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur bar de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do// 
i257b3('bum): gal te mying dang gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang
i257b4('bum): gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi de phyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i257b5('bum): ba la myi spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am
i257b6('bum): bdag gam bdag myed pa'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mying dang gzugs myed do// gal te skye mched drug la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug rtag ces bya
i257b7('bum): ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa spyod do// gal te skye mched drug bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug bdag
i257b8('bum): ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched drug sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
i258a1('bum): zhen / gang dag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye mched drug myed do// gal te reg la myi spyod na shes rab
i258a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa bde bla 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i258a3('bum): tu phyid pa la snang // gas rig pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myang ces bya bar gyi spyod na nas rab kyipa sang tu phyid pa la spyang ngo // gas rag pa sdu ces bya ba'im gyi sdugaces bya gyi smyid na nas sa
i258a4('bum): tu phyin pa la smad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba'am bdag gam bdag byed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur de lta bu'i reg pa myed do// gal te tshor ba la myi sungasan
i258a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes
i258a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad pa
i258a7('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed po 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug pa 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myed do// gal
i258a8('bum): sred pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
i258b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyang ngo // gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdus
i258b2('bum): ces bya bar myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sring
i258b3('bum): pa myed do// gal te len pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa la bde zhes bya
i258b4('bum): ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do// gal te len pa sdug
i258b5('bum): ces bya bar 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug
i258b6('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i len pa myed do// gal te srid pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gagal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
i258b7('bum): gal te srid pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa dag ces bya ba 'am myi ga ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
i258b8('bum): gal te srid pa bsdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
i259a1('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srang ba myang // gal pa skye ba la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la srung nga// gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi smad na/ 
i259a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te skye ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces
i259a3('bum): bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi par bang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba sdug cis bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar mi spang sa zhes rab kyi pa mang tu phyin pa la spyad do// de ma phyir na na/ gang rtag pa la/ 
i259a4('bum): myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug spel ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba myed do// gal te rga shi la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
i259a5('bum): gal teg gi tas ces bya ba 'im skye rnas ces bya bar gyi spyong na shes rab kyi sa ro mang kyi bad pa la sring / gcin pa 'ang zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa bang du phyi
i259a6('bum): la spyod // gal de na shi bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med pa ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang / 
i259a7('bum): du rang pa la spyong du// dotso phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mye rtag pa 'aya/ bde ba'am sdug bsal ga ma/ bdag gas bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'im gyi sdug par 'gyur den bu'i nani mang / 
i259a8('bum): gal te sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyang dri// galate smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar mi spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha raH
i259b1('bum): tu phyind pa la sbed de// gal te sbran pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba
i259b2('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
i259b3('bum): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag po 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am// bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
i259b4('bum): phyind pa myed do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi
i259b5('bum): spyong na shes rab kyi pa ro lang tu phyin pa la spyong nga// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa pang zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngag zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi ring pa la spyod pa/ 
i259b6('bum): gal te tshul grims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces/ 
i259b7('bum): bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
i259b8('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te
i260a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug
i260a2('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa/ 
i260a3('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am
i260a4('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spong na
