i260a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus
i260a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spong ngo // gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba
i260a7('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa sdug za pa 'am myi sdug par mi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe
i260a8('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'om bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// gal de bsam gtan ga
i260b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la mya skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i260b2('bum): spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi smod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa
i260b3('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spong na/ 
i260b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ro/ 
i260b5('bum): lta bu'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ 
i260b6('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i260b7('bum): rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol
i260b8('bum): du phyinang pa sdug ces bya ba bas myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am dod pa 'am sug bsngal ba'am bdag
i261a1('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// gal te nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal
i261a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
i261a3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi phapha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
i261a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nang stong pa
i261a5('bum): nyid myed do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phye stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa
i261a6('bum): gal te phyi stong pa nyid bang nas bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la smra dang // galate phyi stong pa zhid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag sbed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kya
i261a7('bum): rabang du byed pa la srung ba// ga sa kyi stong panyid sugacas byab ma myi sdug cas byab gyi sbyang na shes mi bya pa lang du da pa la srung ngo // ma kyi men/ gas pa ma ngan pa'am dang
i261a8('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de la bu'i byo snang pa nyid medang// galan po rang spang pa nyid la myi srung na shas rab kyi pha lang tu phyi rang pa la song ngo // 
i261b1('bum): srung ba nyid mgacas bya ba nyam myo gnas dra bar gyi srung na/ nas rab kyi pa'i lang tu dad pa ma spyang nga// nagasang nang srung pa nyid bang zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bang myi srung / nas rab kyipa yang
i261b2('bum): tu phyinang pa la srung nga// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba bas bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad man na sa rab kyi pa'i lang tu phyind pa la snang ngo // gal te phyi nang spong ba nyid sdug ces bya ba lam
i261b3('bum): myi sdug pa ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag myed pa
i261b4('bum): 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nang stong pa nyid myed do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i261b5('bum): ces bya ba'am / lci tas ces bya bar gyi spyong na shes rab kyi pa'i lung tu phyin pa la srung de// gzha snang pa nyid stong pa nyid dade zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gyi spong na/ 
i261b6('bum): rab kyi pha lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bacha mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod // gal ta stong pa nyid
i261b7('bum): snang pa nyid sug ces ba / kye+e sug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed do// pa'i phying nan/ gang dag pa'am b+hi rtag pa 'am/ ba pa ma sdug
i261b8('bum): sa gas bdag myed pa 'as/ mug pa'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba des tshu/ sang pa nyid song ba nying ma dang / gal can pa snang ba nyid la gyi srung mnas kyis ra kyi ma
i262a1('bum): gal te chen pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mya rtag ces bya bar mya spyod na shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyind pa la spyad de/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma
i262a2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod de/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid sngas
i262a3('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am mi
i262a4('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chen po stong pa nyid myed do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba
i262a5('bum): ma myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha kya rol tu phyind pa la spor
i262a6('bum): gal te do dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag yar ces bya bar myi spyod ra shes rab kyi pha rol du du spyod do// gal te don dam pa spyod pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar mya spong ra shes ra
i262a7('bum): kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod do// de'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i mthong ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gum bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'am mo sdug par 'gyur
i262a8('bum): ba de lta bu'i don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te 'das pas stong pa nyid la mi smod na shes rab kyi pha rolade tu phyind pa la spod de/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces/ 
i262b1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus
i262b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag byed ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na
i262b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de
i262b4('bum): lta bu'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya
i262b5('bum): myi rtag spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus
i262b6('bum): mi byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i262b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba
i262b8('bum): delta ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sred do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong banyid la myi spyad na shes rab kyi da'o yang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal de 'tha mas 'das pa srung ba nyid dgatses bya ba 'am myi ces
i263a1('bum): bya bar ba spyod na shes rab kyi par yang tu phyind pa la spyad / gal te man thams radas pa slong po nyid 'di zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi smad na shes rab kyi phar lang du phrand pa pa la
i263a2('bum): gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces
i263a3('bum): bya bar mi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am ma sdug par 'gyur ba de la
i263a4('bum): bu'i mthor las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi
i263a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha lang du byind pa la spyad / gal te nag ma dang ba ma myed pa snang pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyong na shes rab kyi pa yang tu phyind pa la smad da/ gas
i263a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag byed ces bya ba 'am myi srung na/ shes rab kyi bar lang du phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te zhog ma dang tha ma myed pa spong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi stso
i263a7('bum): sa bkyi par bang byid pa la spyad/ de kya kyi / gnas pa 'as myi rtag pa'am bad pa' sa sdug gsapa pa ya 'dug pa bdag sred pa ma sdug pa la kyi sdug par 'gyur 'a su du sa
i263a8('bum): byed pa spong bzhid byed pa/ ga bskyed pa nga babyid sa kyi stong shes pa 'i la ma phyin pal sru ga dang babyed pa song nga zhes byab ba mi tan mi gas kyi spang zhes gros
i263b1('bum): phyind pa la spyad ra/ gang dang bgyid pa spong ba 'ang 'de zhes bya ba 'bru sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyad na/ shes rab kyi ba re lang du byind pa la spyod do// gal te dang ba myed pa snang ba nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am
i263b2('bum): bdag phred nas bya bar myi smad shes rab kyi phar lang du phyind pa pa smad na/ gal te der ba myed pa spang ba nyid sdud ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha re lang du byin pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ga
i263b3('bum): shes rab kyi phar yang du byi dad pa la spyod/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mya dag bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi dang pa la spyod de/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba nga
i263b4('bum): sdug 'phrul zhes byang spya na shes bas pa bang du byin pa la spya / gas to rang ba sring banyid 'das kyi ces bya ba'am bdag byed ces byas myi skyed na shes rabagyi pa mang du phyin pa ma spyong sa
i263b5('bum): gal te rang bzhin sdang ba nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba
i263b6('bum): 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa dang myi sdug par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed de/ gal te chos thams cad spang ba nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod de/ gal te ches thams cad sbeng
i264a1('bum): spyad da/ gal te chos thams cad spang pa nyid bdag cus bya bar mya spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod du/ gal te rjes thams cad spang pa dang sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug
i264a2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shing rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag med pa 'am sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu
i264a3('bum): ma sa / ba kyi gi ma na ma mang gang sa mi sru gas rabagyi par la myo pas / zhes gi ma nyid mang po da 'i mi dag cis
i264a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod du/ gal te
i264a5('bum): mdzad nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar mying spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhing sdug ces bya ba 'pho myi sdug ces bya bar rgyu
i264a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed med pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba
i264a7('bum): de lta bu'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi ba kyi ro lad tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya
i264a8('bum): bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa spong pa 'di bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa la spong ngo // gal te myi dmigs pa/ 
i264b1('bum): dang 'a tshas kya sa nga khya sa byas kyi rgyu sa kyil bya pa migs pas kyang dru ces thas m+b+ha mU las bya smra
i264b2('bum): kyi phar lang tu phyind pa la spyod du/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa'am sdug para'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba dag bu sa dkrugs
i264b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na
i264b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed
i264b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na
i264b6('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
i264b7('bum): rangs pa med pa spong pa nyid byed do// gal teng ba nyid stong pa nyid la myi sud na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te ba nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'im myi dgaces bye bar mi spya na shes rab kyi
i264b8('bum): rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed
i265a1('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhen
i265a2('bum): gang rtag pa'am myi dag pa'am bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gas bdag byed pa'am sdug pa ma myi sdug par 'gyur ba de ga/ bung jib cing slob pa nyid byed do// gal te dngas po med par ra ba nyid stong bu zhing la myi spyod nan
i265a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyad do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
i265a4('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
i265a5('bum): ba la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa/ 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug
i265a6('bum): bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i265a7('bum): la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya
i265a8('bum): bar mi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol du gyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te blanye bar gnag pa
i265b1('bum): rnams sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi phar lang du phyi nang pa la spyod da/ de ci'i phyir zhe na gang dag pa 'am myi rig pa'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa'am sdug pa
i265b2('bum): 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnas rtag pa 'am myi rtag
i265b3('bum): ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gshen gal te yang
i265b4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha
i265b5('bum): yang du byin pa la smad dang / dmar bya ben das pa'as kyirtag pa'as bde ba'as sdug bsdug pa'am nga kham pas byed pa 'as srus pa la kyo sdug par 'gyur ba ga su ni yang dag par rung ba rnams kyi
i265b6('bum): gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
i265b7('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
i265b8('bum): gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam
i266a1('bum): ga myong pa'am sdug pa'am mya sdug par 'gyur bde lta bu rngu 'phrul gyi rkang ba nas mya dang / la ta bang nas la ma snyam / sa rab kyi bar yang tu nad pa la spa nga/ gal tan dra ba rnams
i266a2('bum): ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ 
i266a3('bum): gal te dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang ba rnams sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ri lang du phyinas
i266a4('bum): bra la spyod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag kam bdag med pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang bre rnams myed do// gal te sterlabs rnams
i266a5('bum): la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spongad ngo do// gal te stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba
i266a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams
i266a7('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha re lang du phyi nang pa la spyod dang / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stangs
i266b1('bum): tha kyang chub N+DI lan pas rnams pad gas bya ba'am sdug pas lags 'a bar bya spyan nu gas rab kyi sa mang du rtsond pa la snang / gal byang chub kyi yan las rnam nga cis byab ma bdag myed ces byab gyi sman
i266b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te byang chub kyi yan las rnams sdug ces bya ba'am myi sA gnyis byab po spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro yang tu nad pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyi sher/ gang rtag pa 'am gyi
i266b3('bum): pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag myed do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i266b4('bum): spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bshes rab
i266b5('bum): ma us pas zhes byab kyi smang dashes rabakyis yang mye yu la sadang / sa te 'dags pa'i ma yan lag btud pa pas kyis bya ba byas bye rjes bye da du slong na kyis sa byed pal spang
i266b6('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag
i266b7('bum): bdag myed pa sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// gal te 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden
i266b8('bum): marnas rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ra lang du phyind pa la spyad do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyod de/ gal te 'phag
i267a1('bum): pa'i bdem pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed pa par myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la sbed do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod
i267a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la sbed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags
i267a3('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams me nga/ gal tibs gtan nas la myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu dad pa la spyod do// gal te bas gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mye rtag ces bya ba gyi spyod na gyis rab kyi pha rol tu
i267a4('bum): phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnas bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed do// gal te bsam tan nas bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar
i267a5('bum): mi skyed na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa/ gal te bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa
i267a6('bum): 'am myi rtag ces pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan myed de// gal chad myed pa nas la myi spyod na shes ra
i267a7('bum): kyi phar rang tu phyinang pa la spyod de/ gal te chad myed pa rnams nag ces bya ba ngam myi tag ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal techa myed pa rnams bded zhes bya ba'am sngan
i267a8('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar myi smad na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu bri nad pa la spyod do/ gal te chad myeng pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyind pa la spad de/ gal te chang pa rnam
i267b1('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya bar mya spyo na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang rtag pa 'am mya rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am
i267b2('bum): sdig pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de la bu med pa med pa myed do/ gal te gzugs myed pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do/ gal te gzug myed pa'i skams
i267b3('bum): bar 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba myi spyod
i267b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzug myed pa'i
i267b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gas bdag
i267b6('bum): myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna par thar pa
i267b7('bum): brgyad rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
i267b8('bum): gal ten par thadad pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyad do// gal te rna par tha rad pa'i brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
i268a1('bum): pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i na
i268a2('bum): par thadad pa brgyad myed do// gal te mthad kyis gnas pa'i sdom par 'jug pa dgul myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya
i268a3('bum): a myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi par yang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha kyis gnas par snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ba zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol
i268a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rku bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
i268a5('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am myi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag
i268a6('bum): myed pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de la bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed do// gal nga rnam par thadad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i268a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te rnam par thadad pa'i sgo spong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smod pa med pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du byind pa la spangad ngo do// gal te rnam par thar
i268a8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
i268b1('bum): smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thadad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smonang pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi
i268b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
i268b3('bum): ba de lta bu'i rna bar tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myed do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnam
i268b4('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod ngo do// 
i268b5('bum): gal de mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyad do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am myi sdug ces bya b.rang myi spyod na shes rab
i268b6('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rma myed do
i268b7('bum): gas te ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyad do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin
i268b8('bum): rnas bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod de/ gal te ting 'dzind rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod / 
i269a1('bum): gal po ting nge 'dzin nas sdug ces bya ba'am myo sdug ces pa per mi spyod na gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhen// gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag po'am 'di banyam sdug bsngal pa ma bdag sa
i269a2('bum): bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin nas myed do// gal te gzung kyi sgo rnas la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo nas rtag ces bya ba'i myi rtag ces pa
i269a3('bum): ba myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo nas bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzung kyi sgo nas bdag ces bya ba'am
i269a4('bum): 'das myong zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa'i lang du nad pa la srung ngo // gal te ga zungs kyis nas su 'i zhes bya ba 'am myo sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pa bang du phyind pa la srung du/ de ci'i phyi shen/ gang dag pa 'am
i269a5('bum): myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo nas myed do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i269a6('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am mye rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phri nad pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
i269a7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi phar lang du phyind pa la spyad do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcwa
i269a8('bum): sreg ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi sud ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ro'i phyir zhe napa gang dag pa 'am mi dag pa 'am bde ba 'am khasngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lnga
i269b1('bum): bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed do// gal to mya 'jigs pa rnams la mya sprad na shes rab kyi ba rul tu phyind pa la sprad do// gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar mya sprad na
i269b2('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa nas bdag ces bya ba'am bdag
i269b3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa
i269b4('bum): 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myi 'jigs pa rnams myo do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i269b5('bum): bang tu phyin pa la spyong ngo do// gal temo so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtog ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pa mang du phyind pa la spyad de/ gal tes so yang dag par rig po rnams bde zhes bya
i269b6('bum): ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod do/ 
i269b7('bum): gal te sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/ 
i269b8('bum): ma byed pa'am sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur byed ga bungs mi yang dag par rig pa rnams myed do/ gal te byams pa chen po la mi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nga bul spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po
i270a1('bum): rtag ces rgya la nas bya chu spyong dgas rab pa ma gyu swA / ga byangs parten pa byang nas bya ma sdug bsnga skyes byab rgya spyong d+ha shes rab kyil ma
i270a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byams po chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi
i270a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi dag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am gyi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po myed de/ 
i270a4('bum): gal te snying rje chen po la myi skyed na shes rab kyi pa'i yang du phyin pa la skyed do// gal te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po 'di
i270a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod de/ gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying
i270a6('bum): rje chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am myi sdug
i270a7('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po myed do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya ba
i270a8('bum): 'am mye gces bya bar gyi spyong na shes rab kyi pa 'o mad phyin pa la spyod do// gam te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa zhes bya ba ma sug bsngal zhes bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab tu pha rol du phyin pa
i270b1('bum): gshes sa cas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa ces d+ha ba 'am sgyid ces bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kya 'omang du rgyan pa la byung ngo // galasasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
i270b2('bum): sdig pa ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar gyi spyong na shes rabs pa'i yang su phyin pa la spyod do// deba'i gyur nan/ gang dag pa'am myi drug pa'am bde ba 'ang sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am myi sdug
i270b3('bum): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am
i270b4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba la
i270b5('bum): bdag myed na ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
i270b6('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid myed do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i270b7('bum): pasu byed do/ gang selan yin ma bshes pa nyid dag ces byab rgya kye+e tugakyis bya tu spyod nags 'bas pa da byed pal slong nga/ gal las kyinam pashes yang ba shes bya ba ma jug pa ma
i270b8('bum): bya bar myi sbyong dashes rakyi rol datu phyin pa la zung ngo // gal shelam byinam par shes pashing ba dag ces bya ba'am bdag byed ces bya bar myi spyod shes rab gyi song du phyi na pa 'aspyod do ga col ma can
i271a1('bum): shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// dotsa'i phyar zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mya rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag snyed
i271a2('bum): pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces
i271a3('bum): bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal
i271a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nying bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rabs pa rol du rgyan pa la skyed do// gal dernam pa thams cad ma nang pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am myi suM ni ces bya bar myi spyod na
i271a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i271a6('bum): pa nyid myed de// bam po nyi shu gcig pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyingan pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya
i271a7('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal/ 
i271a8('bum): 'tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la spyod do// ngo bo'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa ro'o/ 
i271b1('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de
i271b2('bum): wAr yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shib byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin/ 
i271b3('bum): pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi skyon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod do// gal te rnam par shes pa yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i271b4('bum): rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te myig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i271b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig yongasu ma rdzogs sa pa gang yin pa de myig ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
i271b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa den pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi rgya lang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te skyosa'i yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
i271b7('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na sna yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
i271b8('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus yongs su ma rjes
i272a1('bum): so zhes bya bar myi skyed no shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa lus ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i272a2('bum): la spyod do// gal te yid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa ni yid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi
i272a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ma rdzogs pa gang yid pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
i272a4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no zhes
i272a5('bum): bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod / gang de ltar dri yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la spyod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin
i272a6('bum): nga dri ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ri lang du phyind pa la spyod do// galete ro yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro yongs su ma rdzos
i272a7('bum): pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin no// zhes bya ba de da ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
i272a8('bum): reg yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ri ma yin no// zhes ni reg ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod de/ gal te chos yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes ra
i272b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chas ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa yongasu ma rdzos
i272b2('bum): so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe sa na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab
i272b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te na pa'i rnam par shes pa yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi rolang tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de

i274a1('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyong na gas ra kyi la tu phyi pa la spyod do// de 'dzu zhen/ yang kyi la thams cung 'i byor na mongs smram rtogs pa gang yin pa dro lang kyi 'dus de reg pa las byung ba'i nor ba ma man nams
i274a2('bum): ba sar yang gyi stod de shes rabab lang tu nad pa la spyod do// gnyis 'anas yongs su mardzogs sa nas bya bar du spyod na shes rab kyi ba rom du da pa la spyod do// de ba'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams yongs ma rdzogs pas/ 
i274a3('bum): yin pa des khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyid pa la spyod de// gal te tshur khams mongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
i274a4('bum): tshu khams yongs su mardzogs pa gang yin pa de mu khams ma yin no zhes bya ba daltar yang ni spyon shes rab k+Sha 'om tsu nang pa la spyod do// gami ta mog khams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
i274a5('bum): lang du phyind pa la spyod do// dab phyir zhe na/ mye'i khams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de maung khams ma yin no nas bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams yongs
i274a6('bum): su rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i274a7('bum): phyir pa la spyod de/ gal rten ma ma pa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs so so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab gyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod de/ ngo tsa'i phyir nan/ nam ma kha khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa denam mdza
i274b1('bum): ma yon no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyad de/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
i274b2('bum): zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya

i274b4('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed dem ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//

i275a1('bum): zhe na reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no zhes bya bar myi spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba yong su rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin
