i275a8('bum): myi stong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol pa ngan pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyind pa'i pha rol
i275b1('bum): du phyind pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes bya bar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs so
i275b2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi
i275b3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma
i275b4('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i275b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i275b6('bum): phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa/ 
i275b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i275b8('bum): tu da pa la spyang ngo // dab phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pa mang du bya nad pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa ded shes rab kyi pha lang du byi nad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi srud ngo shes rab kyi pha ro 'o tu phyind pa spyod do// 
i276a1('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nab stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya
i276a2('bum): bde ltar yang myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed de/ gal te bye stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi snang pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs
i276a3('bum): pa phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal to bya nang stong pa nyid yongasu su 'phya bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi nang stong ba 'ang
i276a4('bum): yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phya nang tu pa la su / 
i276a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed de/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
i276a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma
i276a7('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i276a8('bum): tu phyind pa la sbed do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus
i276b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
i276b2('bum): zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs
i276b3('bum): so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes
i276b4('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar gyi/ spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu
i276b5('bum): ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i276b6('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongasasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dong ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rab zhin stong
i276b7('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa/ de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi smad na shes
i276b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin
i277a1('bum): pa de chos thams cad spong ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de kar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi po ramang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nying yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spo na shes rab kyi
i277a2('bum): pha rolang tu phyi rang pa la snang ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// gal te myi dmyigs pa
i277a3('bum): stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin// zhes bya ba de
i277a4('bum): ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
i277a5('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs sa pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i277a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i
i277a7('bum): sa byas kyi da / ngams su ma dzug 'i sa pa byung ba'i
i277b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang ma smad na shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal de yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs/ 
i277b2('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spang ba rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
i277b3('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yo/ 
i277b4('bum): su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
i277b5('bum): meng du phyin pa la spyod do// dbo'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnanas yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de sngar yang myi spya na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal ti stobs rnams / 
i277b6('bum): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi stod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
i277b7('bum): pa la skyed do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// byang chub kyi yan grwa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang ba de byang chub kyi
i277b8('bum): lag rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod / 
i278a1('bum): gang lephags pa'i bden pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa ro mad du byan bra la spyong / dba'i phyir nan// 'phags pa'i bangan pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yan pa de 'phas
i278a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i278a3('bum): bsam gtan ga pa ral tu phyind pa la/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bas gtan ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs
i278a4('bum): sa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chang myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chad myed pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba da ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i278a5('bum): la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams yongs su ma
i278a6('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma 'jug pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnaMs par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du
i278a7('bum): phyinang pa la spyong ngo // dba'i phyir zhen gyi rnam par thard pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ma thar kyis gnas
i278a8('bum): pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
i278b1('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// deci'i phyir byin/ rnam par 'ar nga'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma rnyed pa dang ston du pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa num par tharang ba'i
i278b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sngond myed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i278b3('bum): pa la spyod de ni/ ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang ba de mngon par shes pa rnams min no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams
i278b4('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzind rnams yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi myi spyong na
i278b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs gi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs
i278b6('bum): ba gangaman pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs sum yin mo zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa 'di tu phyid pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs macu yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar myi spyod nags
i278b7('bum): ma pa mang du tsun pa la srung // rob phyir zhe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin du dang bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin na zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyang de gis rab kyi pa/ 
i279a1('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spong ngo // gal dom 'jigs pa bzhi yongs ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi sung na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la srung ngo // do tsa'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs pa pa'i yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin
i279a2('bum): pa myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de lngar yang myi spyad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad // gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs ma rdzogs sa zhes bya bar myi spyad da shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
i279a3('bum): la spyod do// gal te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
i279a4('bum): gal te byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// de ci'i phyir zhe na// byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar/ 
i279a5('bum): yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa
i279a6('bum): gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la sbed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i279a7('bum): kyi pha rel du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind/ 
i279a8('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams
i279b1('bum): cang shes pa nyid su yin na zhes bya ba de ga yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha royong du ldand pa la spyod do// gal tel ma grirnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so nas byam su spyod gas rab tupa meng du byed pa la dun/ 
i279b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad
i279b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
i279b4('bum): nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phrind pa la spyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub ses
i279b5('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstand pa 'di ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// rab 'byor da de de bzhin// 
i279b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstand to// rab 'byor
i279b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes
i279b8('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phunang pa la spong pa'i rtse/ gal te tsho ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ba/ gal te 'du shes chags
i280a1('bum): pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab tu
i280a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ni/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i280a3('bum): pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ gal te myig chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myo spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
i280a4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i280a5('bum): du phyi nang pa la spong po'i cha/ gal te lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myo spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa lnga spyong ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang po la spyod pa'i che/ gal te lus chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
i280a6('bum): myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ste/ gal te yid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
i280a7('bum): du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya byar myi smod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra chags pa 'am ma chags pa
i280a8('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong pa'i tshe/ gas te dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lad du phyi nad pa la spyod do// de shes rab
i280b1('bum): bu mang du phyin sa ma chung po tshe rtsa ba la'i rgyags pa 'am ma mams sngags tu ba sa spyang na gas mad+hA m+b+ham ral du drand pa la spyad do// dgas ky-i mom pa mad pal spyod pa'iga'ata rtags pa
i280b2('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pa rtol da ku phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ gal te chos chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin
i280b3('bum): pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang
i280b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te na pa'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa chags
i280b5('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod do// de shes rab kyi
i280b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i280b7('bum): pa la smod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa
i280b8('bum): chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi skyong ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na
i281a1('bum): shes pha ral du phyi dang pa la smad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i ma/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes sa bAr myi spyad dgas rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa ma
i281a2('bum): spyod da/ dgas rab kyi pa ra lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma mags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa la spyod pa'
i281a3('bum): gal te lus kyis 'dus te reg pa la chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma ma
i281a4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshogs pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
i281a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i281a6('bum): du phyi nang pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ gal de sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus
i281a7('bum): de rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dang pa la spyod dza/ rab kyi pha ro lang du nang pa la spyod pa'i che/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ 
i281a8('bum): me chags pa zhes bya bar bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du nad pa la phyedapo'i rjegal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi su
i281b1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol du byung ba la spyad do// de shes rab kyis pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te re ga pa las byung ba'i tshor ba tshogs pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
i281b2('bum): la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya ba ste myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te/ 
i281b3('bum): chu'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te me'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i281b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha tu phyind pa la spyod
i281b5('bum): pa'i che// gal te nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am mchags
i281b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ma rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod ngo // de shes
i281b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya byar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa tshig
i281b8('bum): 'ams chags pa zhes bya bar sbyang shes sa kyipa'i meng byud pam byed de/ dges kyi ming du dang bus sung ba'i tshe gapa byed pa mazugs rmugs ma brnags pa zhes bya ba mi myong ni shes rab la yo
i282a1('bum): bachags pa 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi srung dashes rang
i282a2('bum): kyi pha rolang du rje rang ba la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyong ba'i che/ kal te sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi da pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i282a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te le nang pa rtags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sring ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa
i282a4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spong ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de/ 
i282a5('bum): dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skyidang
i282a6('bum): po pha rol du nang pa chags pa 'am mi chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la snying po'i rtse/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa chags pa'im
i282a7('bum): chags pa nyis ma ma spo shes ra kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i me / gal te bzod pa'i pha ril du nang pa la spyod chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong
i282b1('bum): shes rab kyi tha ro bang du phyin pa la lung do de shes rab sde pa rabang du phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ ga' de brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyis pa chags pa'amam chams pa zhes bya bar mya skyed na shas rab tu gyu dubs / 
i282b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ gral te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i282b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid
i282b4('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
i282b5('bum): bya pa bong du phyi nang pa la spyod do// re shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i me gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha roso du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi ba rol/ 
i282b6('bum): du byin pa la smod pa'i gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i mag gal te chen po seng
i282b7('bum): nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi
i282b8('bum): spyod du shes rab pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
i283a1('bum): pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du byand pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gol ta 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags ma ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
i283a2('bum): shes rab kyi par yong du phyin pa la spyod pal/ gal te mtha' las 'das ba sung chags pa'im ma chags pa zhes bya bar ma stong na shes rab kyi pa ma du rdzum pa la smad do// de shes
i283a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i283a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid
i283a5('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi du phyinang pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na
i283a6('bum): rab kyi pha ro ljang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol phyind pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de shes rab
i283a7('bum): pa rolang tu phyiphyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos
i283a8('bum): po myed pa spang pa 'ang rigs su khab ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spong na shes can kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i che ga/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags
i283b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am mags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i283b2('bum): pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i phyi tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa nyi ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i283b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ga'u te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnam
i283b4('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i che// gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
i283b5('bum): pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ bya gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod do// de shes ras
i283b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i283b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams
i284a1('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad bra ma spyod/ dri shes ram kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spong ba'i me/ gal te chang myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
i284a2('bum): kyi sred ma shes ma kyi ya yang du da pa la spyod de/ rigs rab kyi pha rolang du da pa la spyon po cigazugs myeng ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi srung na shes
i284a3('bum): pha ralang du phyi rang pa la smad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spad pa'i cha/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la smad de// de shes rab kyi
i284a4('bum): pha rol du phyind pa la spod pa'i tshegal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pa du ro lang tu phyin pa

i284a7('bum): pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol su dzi nad pa la spyod pa'i che gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

i284b1('bum): gal te mya 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am myi chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind nga ba spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha co nga phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshegal te so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi
i284b2('bum): chags pa 'am ma tshugs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol sted tu phyi nad pa la hU~Md da de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa 'am mags pa zhes bya bar myi sa
i284b3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha bal dedu phyinang po la spong ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa le spyod pa'i tshi/ gal te snying rje chen chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes
i284b4('bum): kyi pha ro khrid tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags paM zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i284b5('bum): la spyod pa'i cho/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad dogatag de shes kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma// gal te lam gyi rnam pashes
i284b6('bum): tshigs bya thom ma chags ma zhes bya bar myi spang mashes zab kyi pa'i lung du phyin pa la spyod pa pa de shes rab kyi po khyod du brind pa la spyong pa'i ma gal te rnam pa thams cad mo khye nang pa nyid chags pa 'am mags
i284b7('bum): nas bya bar mi song na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phran du da/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tshor ba chags/ 
i284b8('bum): pa'im ma chags pa nas te bo 'du shes pa 'byung du// 'du shes chags pa 'am ma ya chags pa zhes bya bar thung shes pa myed drol 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed da/ nam par shes
i285a1('bum): la chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig chags pa ma ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myad do/ rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sna chags pa/ 
i285a2('bum): 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar 'dushes pa skyed do// lho chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lus tu chags pa 'am chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myad ngo do// yid chags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya ba

i285b1('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am
i285b2('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar 'dus shes pa myed de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar

i285b4('bum): slang khams rtag smra pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa byed do// tshul khams rnags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes myed do/ mo'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed de/ rlung

i285b7('bum): myong dang gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// skye mched drug / chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa skyed do// rig chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tsher ba

i286a2('bum): pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// chu la thams kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa chags pa'i ma man gas bi zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
i286a3('bum): shes pa myed de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
i286a4('bum): pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid chags pa ma ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ma chags pa zhes

i286a7('bum): slong ba da nags pa 'am ma tshugs pa skyes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa sod pa'ing chags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa byed do// thog sa dang tha ma myed pa mang ba nyid chags pam sa

i311a3('bum): gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pha ri lang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam sems su myi byed / yang dag par spong ba rnas kyis rlom semasum
i311a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la rlom sam su myi byed/ de skyil ma rlom semasu rtsa byed/ rgyam ma gos rlomasas su s+yo byung / rgyams rlom sems su su byed ngo // de sbru ma rlom sem su su byed/ snum
i311a5('bum): rlom sems kyi nyud / sgyu ma la rlom semasu myi byed // de srog su rlom sems su mya byed/ smig su rlom sem su myi byed/ srog sbrul rlom sa su mya byed// de sgra brnyan rlom sem su myi byung

i317a5('bum): nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pal spyod pa'i tshe// thams cad shes pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems myi byed/ thams cad shes pa cid la rlomasams
i317a6('bum): byeng na/ de kyil ma rlom sems su myi byed// rgyalam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rnam semasu ma byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sam su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom semasu myi byed/ snga ma la rlom sem
i317a7('bum): byang ngo // de smig tu rlom sems su mi ba rgyas rlom sem su myi bya sprog rdul rlom sem su mo byed do// gang sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sba ba rnyan gis rlom sems su ma shing / smra
i317a8('bum): rlom sems su m-i byed do// ma sems su mi 'ang rnam rlom sems sa mi 'du mas rlom sems su rtsi ba sa khyad pa mas su mi she
i317b1('bum): su dpa samasanas ba kyi lang du bya dusal spyod pa'i tsha/ ses sa sul bya/ ma gi rnam par
i317b2('bum): sa rnamasems su sa byed/ gyi rnam pa gas pa nyid la rlos sems mo byeng/ de stsol sa rnaM pa sems su ma byeng / rgyal ma 'os rlom sems su mu bya / tshulam la rlom sems su mya bya
i317b3('bum): ma chos sems su mi byang / snrums rlom sems su mi byed / sbru la la rlom yongs su su byeng ngo // de skyog rgya chom sems su myi byed / ga rgyus rlom sems su myo byed/ srog rgyal rtsom sems
i317b4('bum): su myi byed do// de ska ba rnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ ska brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ smra brnyan la rlom sems su mya byed do// de myig yor rlom sem su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom
i317b5('bum): sems su myi byed/ smig yor la rlom sems su mya byed do// de sprulang pa rlom sem su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprulang pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ 
i317b6('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rlom sems su myi byud rnam pa thams
i317b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byedarma lam gyis rlom sems
i317b8('bum): pa~M de TI ma yA rlom sems su mi byed do/ 9/ de snas rlom sems su mI byed sgyu mas rlom semaswA sa mi bsgyums ru mu sems su ma ba // de smrig
